subtypes.type: Lie that you (or someone else) has been arrested

1.warning: marketing results will outperform the costs (fines) if media posts about you. After getting attention from the media, publicly apologize. Do not do anything violent.
examples: Example: In Russia, YouTube is blocked, although some internet providers had  made it available for the users. It was clear that the government will reach the providers, and YouTube will be unavailable soon. The marketing results have likely covered the fines that they had to pay.
